about_the_game:
Mow VR is a wave-based simple shooting game. If you want to enjoy a casual VR shooting game, this game is perfect for you! This is designed to be easily enjoyed by new VR users and light gamers. No need to reload, just keep on defeating the oncoming enemies. It's a stress reliever and so exhilarating. Don't stop, keep moving and shooting fire. As you earn bronze, silver, and gold stars, you will unlock weapons according to the number of stars you have earned. For each weapon, a bronze star is awarded for completing 10 waves, a silver star for completing 20 waves, and a gold star for completing 30 waves. Defeat the enemies, earn stars, unlock weapons, and challenge your limits!

※Guns can be held in left or right hand.
